description: This file defines the interface class IEventHandler which declares callback methods related to container events such as start, stop, failure, and state change within the WPEFramework plugin namespace.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface class providing callback methods for container lifecycle events.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container starts, receiving event data as a JsonObject reference.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container stops, receiving event data as a JsonObject reference.

methods.name: onContainerFailed
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container fails, receiving event data as a JsonObject reference.

methods.name: onContainerStateChange
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container's state changes, receiving event data as a JsonObject reference.
